title: Factors Affecting Individualsâ€™ Cognitive Engagement during Group Work in General Chemistry: Timing, Group Size, and Question Type
content:
Chem. Educ. Res. Pract., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3RP00279A, Paper
Safaa Y. El-Mansy, Alexandra Stephens, Abigale Mortensen, Joan M. Francis, Shayna Feldman, Cecilia A. Sahnow, Jack Barbera, Alissa J. Hartig
Understanding how individual students cognitively engage while participating in small group activities in a General Chemistry class can provide insight into what factors may be influencing their level of engagement....
